body_html:
@eaplatanios : IIUC, this is to allow distribution of your Scala bindings using then nightly builds for the period during which @allenlavoie 's changes to the shared libraries aren't in effect. Given the estimated timeline (O(weeks)), and the fact that in the interim you could build your own libraries instead of using the nightly builds for your distribution, I'm tempted to suggest against adding this operation to the core TensorFlow libraries.

Thanks for for your understanding.

body:
@eaplatanios : IIUC, this is to allow distribution of your Scala bindings using then nightly builds for the period during which @allenlavoie 's changes to the shared libraries aren't in effect. Given the estimated timeline (O(weeks)), and the fact that in the interim you could build your own libraries instead of using the nightly builds for your distribution, I'm tempted to suggest against adding this operation to the core TensorFlow libraries.

Thanks for for your understanding.
